#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

string del(string s,char del)
{
int i;
for(i=0;i<s.size();i++)
if(s[i]==del)
s[i]='$';

return s;
}


int check(string s,char k)
{
int i;
int sum=0;
for(i=0;i<s.size();i++)
if(s[i]==k)
sum++;

return sum;
}

string rev(string s,int pos)
{
char ch;
int l=pos-1;
int y;
if(pos%2==0)
y=pos/2 ;
else
y=pos/2;

//cout<<"I am y "<<y<<endl;
for(int i=0;i<y;i++)
{
ch=s[i];
s[i]=s[l];
s[l]=ch;

l--;
}

return s;
}




int main()
{


string s;
cin>>s;

int k;
cin>>k;
char a,b;
while(k--)
{

cin>>a>>b;

if(a=='S')
s[0]=b;

if(a=='D')
s=del(s,b);

if(a=='R')
s=rev(s,(int)(b-48));


//cout<<s<<endl;
}
cin>>b;
int ans=check(s,b);
if(ans%2==0)
cout<<"YES\n";
else
cout<<"NO\n";



return 0;
}
